experience.title: Junior Programmer Analyst
experience.body: Carrying out maintenance of the institution's internal applications, technical support, and creation of a provisional website, which was operational until July 2023.

myprojects.title: Pokedex Pokemon - Find your favorite Pokemons!
myprojects.body: Website which you can find Pokemons, making use of the API called PokeAPI. Built from scratch with Next.js and React.

myprojects.title: Tic Tac Toe
myprojects.body: Website which you can play the classic Tic Tac Toe. Built from scratch with React.

myprojects.title: I.M.C.P. Website
myprojects.body: Provisional Website carried out during my staying at the I.M.C.P; Built from scratch with React.

about.content:
Web developer specialized in Front-End web applications with React, Vue.js and Astro.

I have the title of Computing University Technical College from the Instituto Universitario de Mercadotecnia, and since august 2023, I have been studying English at Oxford Venezuela institute.

I am currently 20 years old and I live in Caracas, Venezuela.

card.title: Computing University Technical College
card.body: Title of Computing University Technical College at Instituto Universitario de Mercadotecnia (I.S.U.M.).
